price: Hinggil naman sa sinumang bibigyan ng talaan niya sa bandang likod niya,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
